nodes.bodyText: Is this part of the fix? It seems unrelated.
rolled back since it didn't work.

What about we want to integrate jobs service with data index or infinispan? I think we should think a value here where we can still configure all the containers accordingly.
Also, we can do this once we need it.

yeah, we could have some way to control the order the test resources are initialized, for now, the only restriction we have when setting the Testcontainers.exposeHostPorts it should be done before the container starts.
rolled back since it didn't work.
If we want to prevent super.start() execution, what about a comment here to mention the reason?

the start() needs to be implemented because it is from the interface TestResource, basically, there is no super.start(), I moved the initialization of the port to the constructor inserted of the start() method.
